question: ADIPEC- Â one of the most influential global conference in the field of oil and gas is being organized in which city?
explanation:
ADIPEC-2019 is being organized at Abu Dhabi International Petroleum Exhibition and Conference from November 10-12, 2019. ADIPEC is one of the most influential global conferences in the field of oil and gas. More than 1, 45,000 delegates from all over the world are to attend the conference.
As a part of the workshop, India will conduct a road show to attract foreign investment, especially in the field of oil and gas. India is to use this opportunity to find new markets of steel in the Middle East countries.
